title: Looking for a clan in Clash of Clans that plays LoL? Look within :D
body:
If you play Clash of Clans and are looking for a clan whose members often play League, you should join "jovan is cancer".
Most of us are silver, a few golds and a few bronzies. Only really aimed at people who play league often, so that if you're ever looking for a duo partner, or more people for a premade normal/aram/twisted treeline game, you can just shoot us a message via clash if we're not on LoL.
Thanks for reading :D

replies.body: almost-maxed TH9 here, currently into the clan i started in as a th3, but i'll save the name in case i decide to move out ;) thanks for sharing.
